title.rendered: Miss Peregrine Deals + James Farmer + Kansas

content.rendered:
Atchison, Here We Come!

Our warehouse is buzzing today as our staff pulls, prices, and packs inventory for Walls of Books in Atchison, Kansas. We handpick books for our franchises so they open with a full inventory of relevant and popular titles. Stay tuned for more updates!

$5 Puzzles for Adults

Make sure you take advantage of this great deal! Puzzles for adults are only $5 each at Gottwals Books.

Read Before You Watch

“I used to dream about escaping my ordinary life, but my life was never ordinary. I had simply failed to notice how extraordinary it was.” – Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children

Join in on this tale of the extraordinary! Miss Peregrine’s Home and Hollow City are $7.97 and $6.97, respectively at Gottwals Books.

New and Popular

Check out our new releases and popular titles section at all of our locations.

James Farmer

We have hundreds of James Farmer books now in stock! James Farmer is a lifestyle guru, designer, and author who calls Middle Georgia home. More information can be found at jamesfarmer.com.

We have A Time to Celebrate, A Time to Plant, Dinner on the Grounds, and A Time to Cook all for only $19.97 each (MSRP $35-$40)! These books are on display at our Perry location, but we can transfer copies to the Gottwals Books of your choice.

Save

Save
